00004 void set_darray2d_zero(double **arr, int NX, int NY) {
00005         int x, y;
00006         for (x = 0; x < NX; x++)
00007                 for (y = 0; y < NY; y++)
00008                         arr[x][y] = 0.0;
00009 }

00034 void add_fix_darray2d(double arr1[NXMEM][NYMEM], double arr2[NXMEM][NYMEM]) {
00035         int x, y;
00036         for (x = 0; x < NXMEM; x++)
00037                 for (y = 0; y < NYMEM; y++)
00038                         arr1[x][y] += arr2[x][y];
00039 }

00041 void mult_fix_darray2d(double arr[NXMEM][NYMEM], double factor) {
00042         int x, y;
00043         for (x = 0; x < NXMEM; x++)
00044                 for (y = 0; y < NYMEM; y++)
00045                         arr[x][y] *= factor;
00046 }

00064 void mult_fix_darray2d_mv(double arr[NXMEM][NYMEM], double factor,
00065                 double D[NXMEM][NYMEM], double mv) {
00066         int x, y;
00067         for (x = 0; x < NXMEM; x++)
00068                 for (y = 0; y < NYMEM; y++)
00069                         if (D[x][y] > MINIMUM_DEPTH) {
00070                                 arr[x][y] *= factor;
00071                         } else {
00072                                 arr[x][y] = mv;
00073                         }
00074 }

00115 // begin ashao
00116 double linear_interp(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double xstar) {
00117         double ystar;
00118 
00119         ystar = y0 + (xstar - x0) * (y1 - y0) / (x1 - x0);
00120 
00121         return ystar;
00122 }
